meanings.definition: To elaborate to excess or in unnecessary detail.
meanings.sent1: She overelaborated her story, making it longer than needed.
meanings.sent2: He always overelaborated when explaining simple tasks.
meanings.sent3: The children overelaborated their excuses for being late to school.
meanings.sent4: The chef overelaborated the recipe, adding unnecessary ingredients.
meanings.sent5: The artist overelaborated the painting, adding too many details.

meanings.sent1: The overelaborated design of the dress made it difficult to move in.
meanings.sent2: The report was overelaborated with unnecessary graphs and charts.
meanings.sent3: The overelaborated cake decoration looked more like a sculpture.
meanings.sent4: Her overelaborated explanation confused the audience.
meanings.sent5: The overelaborated plan had too many steps to follow easily.
